Refcard.help: Show project reference card using refcard.html and project-card.html as templates.

Treemap.help: Show a Treemap using data in JSON file with a specific format (sample).

Bubbles.help: Show a bubble map with specific evolution metrics for each data source. For SCM scm_commits and scm_committers.

radius.help: Radius of the bubbles. Make it smaller if bubbles overlaps.

MicrodashText.help: Show global and tendency data for a metric for last week, month and year

LastActivity.help: Global data for all data sources for a period.

GlobalData.help: Show a specific global data for a data source.

field.help: Specific global metric (field) to be shown.

Summary.help: Show a summary with all global data for a data source.

frame-time.help: Show only the time frame with activity.

graph.help: Use bars to change from lines to bars.

help.help: Show button to open help dialog.

light-style.help: (optional:boolean) Shows a lighter chart (using grey colors, without legend, etc ..).

remove-last-point.help: Remove last data point from graph.

TimeTo.help: Show time to fix/attention using quantiles evolution specified

quantil.help: Quantiles to show separated by commas (X0.99,X0.95).

MetricsEvolSet.help: Show time evolution of all metrics of a data source. Some metrics could be hidden with viz_cfg.json file.

relative.help: Show relative values useful for relative area charts.

Microdash.help: Show global, evolution viz and tendency data for a metric

Top.help: Show Top contributors for a data source, using graphs and linking to people pages if not disabled.

graph.help: Add to report table a graph with the data.

limit.help: Max number of top items to show.

people_links.help: Show URL links to people pages.

period_all.help: Boolean. Show all period of time available with tabs

show-all.help: Show all periods of time available.

threads_links.help: Link the subject of the threads using Google search

PersonData.help: Show name, email and identities for a person.

person_id.help: Person id according to JSON data.

PersonMetrics.help: Show time evolution metric for a person.

person_id.help: Person id according to JSON data.

PersonSummary.help: Show global metrics for a person and a data source.

person_id.help: Person id according to JSON data.

Demographics.help: Show a bars graph with the demography data in JSON file, grouping using period of times (years)

period.help: Number of years to group items together (0.25 for quarters).

FilterItemsSummary.help: Show global metrics for a data source and a filter study (companies, repos, countries)

filter.help: Filter to be used (companies, countries, repos).

FilterItemsMetricsEvol.help: Show together one time evolution metric for all items (companies, repos, countries) in a filter study.

filter.help: Filter to be used (companies, countries, repos).

FilterItemsGlobal.help: Show a metric for all items (companies, repos, countries) in a filter study using a bars or pie graph.

filter.help: Filter to be used (companies, countries, repos).

order_by.help: Order by a supported metric. All widgets for a data source and filter must have the same order.

legend-div.help: div where the legend should be shown.

FilterItemsNav.help: Show a navigation bar with links to items (companies, repos, countries) details.

filter.help: Filter to be used (companies, countries, repos).

FilterItemsMiniCharts.help: Show a list of time evolution metrics graph for all items (companies, repos, countries) in a filter study.

filter.help: Filter to be used (companies, countries, repos).

show_links.help: Show URL links to items specific pages.

remove-last-point.help: Remove last data point from graph.

FilterItemData.help: Show global data (name) for an item (company, repo, country)

FilterItemSummary.help: Show all global metrics for an item (company, repo, country)

filter.help: Filter to be used (companies, countries, repos).

item.help: Identifier of item to be shown (repos identifiers)

FilterItemMetricsEvol.help: Show together time evolution metrics for an item (company, repo, country)

filter.help: Filter to be used (companies, countries, repos).

item.help: Identifier of item to be shown (repos identifiers)

frame-time.help: Show only the time frame with activity.

remove-last-point.help: Remove last data point from graph.

FilterItemTop.help: Show Top contributors for a data source and item (company, repo, country) using graphs.

titles.help: Show titles or just table data.

filter.help: Filter to be used (companies, countries, repos).

item.help: Identifier of item to be shown (repos identifiers)

period.help: Period of time in which top is computed.
